pages.index: PokerChamp | Home of Exciting Poker Tournaments and Ultimate Poker Experience PokerChamp Home System Support Tournament A chosen player Start today Welcome to PokerChamp Join the most exciting poker tournaments and become the ultimate Poker Champion! Experience the thrill of the game, test your skills against the best, and claim your place at the top. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, PokerChamp offers a platform for everyone to shine. Join 01 Tournament Schedule Stay up-to-date with all our upcoming tournaments. From daily games to major events, our schedule is packed with opportunities for you to play and win big. Don’t miss out on your chance to compete! 02 Player Rankings Check out our player rankings and see where you stand. Compete with the best, climb the leaderboards, and earn your place among the top players in the PokerChamp community. Latest News Stay informed with the latest news and updates from the poker world. We bring you the most recent developments, tournament results, and exclusive interviews with top players. Strategy Tips Improve your game with our expert strategy tips. From beginner to advanced techniques, our tips will help you enhance your skills and increase your chances of winning. Community Forum Join our community forum to connect with other poker enthusiasts. Share your experiences, discuss strategies, and find support from fellow players. Featured Player John "Ace" Doe Meet our featured player of the month, John "Ace" Doe. With an impressive track record and numerous tournament wins, John has become a true inspiration for our community. Read more about his journey and tips for success. Get Started Today Join PokerChamp Now Sign up today and start your journey to becoming a poker champion. It’s quick, easy, and free to join. Don’t wait – your seat at the table is waiting! 1 Register for Free Create your free account and get instant access to all our tournaments and features. Enjoy exclusive benefits and start playing right away. 2 Choose Your Game Whether you prefer Texas Hold’em, Omaha, or other poker variants, we have the perfect game for you. Explore our wide range of options and find your favorite. 3 Compete and Win Enter our tournaments and compete against the best. With big prizes and endless excitement, there’s always a chance to win big at PokerChamp. 4 Exclusive Rewards Earn rewards and bonuses as you play. From entry tickets to special events to cash prizes, our reward system is designed to make your experience even more enjoyable. Success Stories Read inspiring stories from our players who have won big and achieved their dreams. Get motivated by their journeys and learn from their experiences. Upcoming Events Mark your calendar with our upcoming events. Whether it’s a major tournament or a special promotion, there’s always something exciting happening at PokerChamp. Tips and Tricks Discover essential tips and tricks to improve your gameplay. From mastering the basics to advanced strategies, our guides will help you become a better player. Customer Support Need help? Our customer support team is here to assist you 24/7. Whether you have a question about your account or need assistance with a game, we’re here to help. To learn more Safe and Secure At PokerChamp, your security is our priority. We use the latest technology to ensure your information and transactions are safe and secure. To learn more Responsible Gaming We promote responsible gaming and provide resources to help you play responsibly. Find tips and support to ensure your gaming experience remains fun and safe. To learn more Stay Connected Subscribe to Our Newsletter Address Balaji Corporate Park, P&T Colony, Kotwal Nagar, Pratap Nagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440020, India Phone +91-787-5444119 Email pokerchamp@gmail.com I accept the Privacy Policy Send a message PokerChamp © 2024 PokerChamp. pages.privacy-policy: PokerChamp | Privacy Policy | Protecting Your Personal Information and Data PokerChamp Home System Support Tournament A chosen player Start today Privacy Policy Information We May Collect From You We may collect and process the following data about you: Information that you provide by filling in forms on our site. This includes information provided at the time of registering to use our site, subscribing to our service, posting material, or requesting further services. We may also ask you for information when you enter a competition or promotion sponsored by us, and when you report a problem with our site. If you contact us, we may keep a record of that correspondence. We may also ask you to complete surveys that we use for research purposes, although you do not have to respond to them. Details of transactions you carry out through our site and of the fulfillment of your orders. Details of your visits to our site including, but not limited to, traffic data, location data, weblogs, and other communication data, whether this is required for our own billing purposes or otherwise, and the resources that you access. IP Addresses and Cookies We may collect information about your computer, including where available your IP address, operating system, and browser type, for system administration and to report aggregate information to our advertisers. This is statistical data about our users' browsing actions and patterns and does not identify any individual. For the same reason, we may obtain information about your general internet usage by using a cookie file which is stored on the hard drive of your computer. Cookies contain information that is transferred to your computer's hard drive. They help us to improve our site and to deliver a better and more personalized service. They enable us: To estimate our audience size and usage pattern. To store information about your preferences, and so allow us to customize our site according to your individual interests. To recognize you when you return to our site. You may refuse to accept cookies by activating the setting on your browser which allows you to refuse the setting of cookies. However, if you select this setting, you may be unable to access certain parts of our site. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, our system will issue cookies when you log on to our site. Uses Made of the Information We use information held about you in the following ways: To ensure that content from our site is presented in the most effective manner for you and for your computer. To provide you with information, products, or services that you request from us or which we feel may interest you, where you have consented to be contacted for such purposes. To carry out our obligations arising from any contracts entered into between you and us. To allow you to participate in interactive features of our service when you choose to do so. To notify you about changes to our service. Contact Questions, comments, and requests regarding this privacy policy are welcomed and should be addressed to pokerchamp@gmail.com. PokerChamp © 2024 PokerChamp. All Rights Reserved. | Your Ultimate Destination for Poker Tournaments Navigation Home System Support Tournament A chosen player Start today Additionally Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use Contacts +91-787-5444119 pokerchamp@gmail.com Balaji Corporate Park, P&T Colony, Kotwal Nagar, Pratap Nagar, Nagpur, Maharashtra 440020, India
pages.terms-conditions: PokerChamp | Terms of Use | Rules and Regulations for Using Our Platform PokerChamp Home System Support Tournament A chosen player Start today Terms of Use Eligibility To use our website, you must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms. You must also comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction regarding online gaming. Account Registration To participate in our poker tournaments, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when registering for an account, and to keep your account information up-to-date. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login information and for any activity that occurs under your account. Tournament Rules Our poker tournaments are subject to the rules and regulations set forth in our Tournament Rules section. By participating in a tournament, you agree to abide by these rules and any additional rules or guidelines provided by us. Conduct You agree to use our website in a manner that is lawful, respectful, and consistent with these Terms. You may not use our website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or in a way that violates the rights of others. You may not engage in any behavior that is abusive, harassing, or threatening to other users or our staff. Intellectual Property Our website and its contents, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the property of PokerChamp and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not use, copy, modify, or distribute any of our website's contents without our express written consent. Disclaimer of Warranties Our website is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not warrant that our website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components. Limitation of Liability In no event shall PokerChamp be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our website, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, goodwill, or data. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless PokerChamp and its affiliates, officers, agents, and employees from any claim, demand, or damage, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of or in connection with your use of our website, your violation of these Terms, or your violation of any rights of another. Termination We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our website at any time, without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to your violation of these Terms or any applicable laws or regulations. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and PokerChamp regarding the use of our website, superseding any prior agreements or understandings. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time, without notice, by posting updated Terms on our website. Your continued use of our website after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at pokerchamp@gmail.com. PokerChamp © 2024 PokerChamp. pages.thanks: PokerChamp | Thank You for Joining Us | Welcome to the PokerChamp Community Thank You for Reaching Out! We truly appreciate you taking the time to connect with us here at PokerMasters. Your input is invaluable, and we're always thrilled to hear from our community members. Rest assured, your message has been successfully delivered to our team. Our dedicated team is committed to reviewing each and every message we receive. We'll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible, usually within 24-48 hours. Please be aware that response times may be longer during weekends, holidays, or periods of high message volume. In the meantime, feel free to continue exploring our website for the latest poker strategies, news, and updates. We're constantly working on new content to help you improve your skills and stay informed about the world of poker. Once again, thank you for connecting with PokerMasters. We look forward to responding to your message and helping you on your poker journey. Return to Homepage
pages.tournament: PokerChamp | Upcoming Poker Tournaments, Major Events, and Competitive Poker Action PokerChamp Home System Support Tournament A chosen player Start today Upcoming Tournaments July Championship Get ready for the July Championship! Join the excitement and compete against the best players for a chance to win big. With a massive prize pool and intense competition, this is a tournament you don’t want to miss. Weekly Showdown Test your skills in our weekly showdown. Every week brings a new opportunity to prove yourself and climb the leaderboard. Don’t miss your chance to shine! Monthly Major Our Monthly Major tournaments are where legends are made. With higher stakes and bigger rewards, these events attract the top talent. Are you ready to take on the challenge? Satellite Tournaments Win your way into major events with our satellite tournaments. These smaller competitions offer entry tickets to larger tournaments, giving everyone a shot at the big leagues. Freeroll Frenzy Enjoy the thrill of competition without any buy-in! Our Freeroll Frenzy tournaments are free to enter and offer real prizes. Perfect for beginners and seasoned players alike. Special Events Join our special events for unique formats and exclusive prizes. From themed tournaments to charity events, there’s always something exciting happening at PokerChamp. High Roller Series For those who seek the highest stakes, our High Roller Series offers unparalleled excitement. Compete for massive prize pools and showcase your skills against the elite. Tournament Stats PokerChamp by the Numbers 1,200+ Tournaments Held 50,000+ Players Participated $10,000,000% Prize Money Awarded 100+ Countries Represented Grand Slam Winners Celebrate our Grand Slam winners who have taken home the biggest prizes. pages.disclaimer: PokerChamp | Legal Disclaimer and Important Information About Our Services PokerChamp Home System Support Tournament A chosen player Start today Disclaimer User Conduct By using PokerChamp's website, you agree to abide by certain rules of conduct. You agree not to: Use our website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose; Use any automated means, including but not limited to robots, spiders, or scrapers, to access, collect, or use any content or information on our website; Use any device, software, or routine that interferes with the proper functioning of our website or attempt to interfere with the proper functioning of our website; Take any action that imposes an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on our infrastructure; Use our website to transmit any material that is defamatory, offensive, harassing, obscene, indecent, pornographic, abusive, threatening, or otherwise objectionable; Use our website to transmit any material that violates or infringes upon the rights of others, including but not limited to intellectual property rights, privacy rights, and publicity rights; Use our website to impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity; Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of our website or any other systems or networks connected to our website; or Use our website to transmit any viruses, worms, Trojan horses, or other malicious code or harmful components. Privacy Policy PokerChamp is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about our users. By using our website, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Registration and Account Security To participate in PokerChamp's poker tournaments, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. You agree to immediately notify PokerChamp of any unauthorized use of your account or password or any other breach of security. Termination PokerChamp reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website or services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice. Without limiting the foregoing, PokerChamp may terminate or suspend your access to our website or services if you breach any of these terms and conditions, if you engage in any conduct that we determine, in our sole discretion, to be unacceptable, or if we believe that your use of our website or services is harmful to us or our other users. No Waiver PokerChamp's failure to enforce any provision of these terms and conditions shall not be deemed a waiver of such provision nor of the right to enforce such provision. Severability If any provision of these terms and conditions is held to be invalid or unenforceable, such provision shall be struck and the remaining provisions shall be enforced. Entire Agreement These terms and conditions, together with our Privacy Policy and any other legal notices or agreements published on our website, constitute the entire agreement between you and PokerChamp regarding your use of our website and services. Feedback and Suggestions If you provide any feedback or suggestions to PokerChamp regarding our website or services, you hereby assign to PokerChamp all rights, title, and interest in and to such feedback or suggestions, and PokerChamp shall have the right to use and exploit such feedback or suggestions in any manner it deems appropriate without compensation pokerchamp@gmail.com PokerChamp © 2024 PokerChamp.
